import React from'react';import{useTranslation}from'contexts/Localization';import{Text}from'@pancakeswap/uikit';import{SVG,WonSlice,LostSlice,Wrapper,Info}from'./PnlChartStyles';/**
 * Bare minimum chart that doesn't require any external dependencies
 * For details read here - https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2015/07/designing-simple-pie-charts-with-css/
 */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";// 2 * Pi * R
var CIRCUMFERENCE=339.292;var PnlChart=function PnlChart(_ref){var lost=_ref.lost,won=_ref.won;var _useTranslation=useTranslation(),t=_useTranslation.t;var percentageWon=(won*100/(lost+won)).toFixed(2);var paintLost=lost/(won+lost)*CIRCUMFERENCE;var paintWon=CIRCUMFERENCE-paintLost;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Wrapper,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(SVG,{viewBox:"0 0 128 128",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LostSlice,{r:"54",cx:"64",cy:"64",length:paintLost}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WonSlice,{r:"54",cx:"64",cy:"64",length:paintWon,offset:paintLost})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Info,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{small:true,lineHeight:"1",children:t('Won')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Text,{bold:true,fontSize:"20px",lineHeight:"1",children:[won,"/",won+lost]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Text,{small:true,lineHeight:"1",color:"textSubtle",children:[percentageWon,"%"]})]})]});};export default PnlChart;
